TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CertificateRequest extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents an abstraction over the PKCS#10 CertificationRequestInfo and the X.509 TbsCertificate.

span.span: Represents an abstraction over the PKCS#10 CertificationRequestInfo and the X.509 TbsCertificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许调用方创建自签名或链签名 X.509 公钥的证书，以及有关创建证书签名请求发送到证书颁发机构 (CA) 的 blob。The class allows callers to create self-signed or chain-signed X.509 Public-Key Certificates, as well as to create a certificate signing request blob to send to a Certificate Authority (CA).
